about_the_game:
Seventh Choir is a horror game inspired by PS2 hunting games and the Book of Revelation.

Descend down the eerie corridors of an ancient cavern. Meet a strange cloaked figure whose face is obscured by an ominous mask. Listen and believe as he tells you the word of the one who brought forth the cries of the seventh choir.

A short horror experience that can be completed within an hour.

Features

Immersive Story: Prologue with branching dialogue options introduces you to the game's dark religious lore.
Lo-Fi Visuals: Retro graphics inspired by PS2-era games.
Exploration: Venture through a snow-covered landscape of marshes, forests, and ruins of a forgotten time.
Realistic Hunting Gameplay: Glassing for animals, sitting in a blind, and tracking your kill through the snow.
Suspenseful Audio: Chilling soundscapes of a dying swamp pull you deeper into suspense.
Mystic Characters: Compelling visuals of beings from beyond.

Story

As you listen to the word of the seventh choir, you find yourself in a dense frozen swamp armed with a rifle. You must navigate this cold foreboding landscape and find the elk you were tasked to kill. As you track the elk, he pulls you deeper into the depths of the swamp where night falls, and you discover the lost relics of a forgotten faith.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood and Gore. Depictions of dead Animals

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 or newer
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 or newer
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Seventh Choir is a horror game about a hunter who is sent to kill an elk deep within a snow covered swamp. Look to those in the heavens and believe the cry of the seventh choir. A short atmospheric horror game inspired by PS2 hunting games and the Book of Revelation.
